title: The latest addition at Innovative Eye Care

title: Macula Month 2020

title: Computer vision syndrome and working from home
author: Dylan Bentley
data: Recently, computer vision syndrome has emerged as a term that describes a group of eye and vision related problems resulting from poor visual hygiene when using a computer.
